text: Ara tini'i se'ijana yini malayabayuprabaha pathana tamra anugrahera prakkale susambadabahirupe. Sesa paryanta yakhana tara saghana meghamala bahana kaâ€™re ane, amara takhana ta mrta bhukhandera dike patha'i, tarapara amara tate pani barsana kari, tarapare era sahayye utpadana kari saba rakamera phalaphasala. E'ibhabe amara mrtake bera kare ani, yena tomara smarana karate paro.
